Author: VampFag88
Text: I've been on the OMAD diet for more than a decade.  More than one meal a day feels gratuitous.

Author: stevieisbored
Text: I'm trying to do this as well. Adding nuts, seeds, and nut butter really helps add up calories when you need to without adding too much volume. I also like avocados because they really help me stay full until the next meal, and they're super nutritious. Protein shakes are a great idea, too! Basically if you're looking to meet calorie requirements without overfilling your stomach, calorie-dense foods work wonders. I want to lose weight without starving myself but have an overwhelming urge to binge, and I always try to fast to compensate, so OMAD really helps me avoid more dangerous ED behaviors.
